2.req: Talk to M F Hussain's Story
2.res: Alright. Let's get M F Hussain's Story.Maqbool Fida Husain (17 September 1915 – 9 June 2011) was one of the most famous artist of India. He was a modern Indian painter of international acclaim, and a founding member of Bombay Progressive Artists' Group. In 1967, he received the National Film Award for Best Experimental Film for Through the Eyes of a Painter. In 2004, he directed Meenaxi: A Tale of Three Cities, a film he worked on with his artist son Owais Husain, which was screened in the Marché du film section of the 2004 Cannes Film Festival.
req_list: Talk to M F Hussain's Story
